text: Nuko abantu be baza bihuta bamusanga, kandi kuva na mbere bari basanzwe bakora amahano (ubutinganyi). Aravuga ati “Yemwe bantu banjye! Ngaba abakobwa banjye ni bo babakwiye (mwashyingiranwa na bo). Ngaho nimugandukire Allah kandi ntimunkoze isoni imbere y’abashyitsi banjye! Ese nta n’umwe muri mwe ufite ubwenge?”
